Room.Name: Netherworld Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Netherworld Lane, between the Iilandri Campus.
Room.LongDescription: The Iilandi University was created some decades ago by a grant from the Iilandi family in order to bring a higher education campus to Oceancrest. The city of Oceancrest then took up the funding for the school since maintaining it was virtually free. The school grew and propered, and has since become a major force in the intellectual community.
